TopicTitle: Help with New Planet factory CE system?

Articles.Content:
So, I'm creating something in PlanetFactoryCE called "The Other Solar System". Its supposed to be our solar system. I downloaded maps of all the planets (I haven't gotten to moons yet), and put them in the SunXF1 folder (Thats what I'm calling the sun), and called them earth_map, mars_map, etc. They all still just look like the template planets that I chose. Anyone willing to take a look and help me figure this out? I have a skype if that helps.

README: This is not supposed to be the exact distances from the sun, I tried that and it did not work.

Some other known issues:

Pluto's orbit (or non-orbit) is demented.

Jupiter does not load.

Mercury is inside of Venus.

Link to SunXF1 folder:https://www.dropbox.com/s/b2ousqy0t5snmei/SunXF1.zip

Help please!
Make sure you have a height map for each planet, and copy the _map thing and name it "(nameofplanet)_color"
